page_analysis.text_content:
Allowable daylight plane protrusions summary

Feature

Television and radio antennas

Chimneys and flues < 5' wide

Dormers, roof decks, gabels, or similar
architectural features

Cornices, eaves, and similar architectural
features (excluding flat or continuous walls
or enclosures usable for interior space)

Allowable protrusion

up to 15' above maximum building
height

may extend beyond the daylight plane to
meet minimum required clearance of
Building Code (Chapter 16.04)

each feature ≤ 7.5' long and cumulative
length of all features ≤ 15' with min 5'
separation between features (on each
side); height ≤ 24';

max 2'

Illustration

Fig 20 on p. 26

Fig 20 on p. 26 &
Fig 23 on p. 28

Fig 22 on p. 27

29
